question: You have seen an advertisement in an Australian Magazine for someone to live with a family for six months and look after their six-years old Child.Write a letter to the parents, in your letters•	Explain why you would like the job•	Give details of why you would be a suitable person to employ•	Say how you would spend your free time while you are in Australia
text: I am writing this letter in reference to your advertisement for the position of caretaker for your 6-year-old kid.

I am currently working in Swiss for an Irish family taking care of their two children. I was unaware of how rewarding it is to take care of children before I took the job. As an enthusiastic and friendly person, I get along well with the children and would love to spend time with them.

I have an experience of 10 years of caretaking similar age group children and I can also assist them with their studies. I am a trainer painter and I can teach the children the art of painting and craft making. I have  good culinary skills and I pay special attention to the health of the children and the family.
As a traveller-loving person, I would like to travel to different parts of the world and explore the culture. I would like to spend my free time surfing with the locals and master my painting skill.
I can also get a reference letter from my current employer if needed. I look forward to hearing from you.
